alert.note: Alert for Lagrange; Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 9:35PM EST until March 10 at 11:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to overspread the area late this evening and continue overnight. A brief mix of rain and snow is possible initially late this evening. The heaviest snowfall is expected from midnight to 6 AM EST Friday morning when snowfall rates of one half inch to 1 inch per hour are possible at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
